mapper.insert: INSERT INTO call(call_no, call_code, call_date, real_pay, start_addr, start_keyword, start_x, start_y, end_addr, end_keyword, end_x, end_y, call_state_code, star) VALUES (seq_call_call_no.NEXTVAL, 'R', TO_DATE(#{callDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{realPay}, #{startAddr}, #{startKeyword}, #{startX}, #{startY}, #{endAddr}, #{endKeyword}, #{endX}, #{endY}, '운행전', 5)
mapper.select: SELECT call.call_no FROM call, users, pay WHERE users.user_no=#{userNo} AND users.user_no=pay.user_no AND call.call_no=pay.call_no AND call.call_state_code='운행전'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO deal(deal_no, driver_no, call_no, passenger_offer, driver_offer) VALUES (seq_deal_deal_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{callNo}, #{passengerOffer}, #{driverOffer:NUMERIC})
mapper.select: SELECT deal.call_no, deal.passenger_offer FROM deal, users WHERE users.user_no=#{userNo} AND users.user_no=deal.driver_no AND users.role='passenger'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM( SELECT deal.call_no, deal.deal_no, deal.driver_no, deal.passenger_offer FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND users.user_no=deal.driver_no AND users.role='passenger' ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM( SELECT deal.driver_offer, deal.call_no, deal.driver_no FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND call.call_no=#{callNo} AND call.call_state_code='운행전' AND users.user_no=deal.driver_no AND users.role='driver') inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum}) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT deal.call_no, deal.deal_no, deal.driver_no, deal.passenger_offer FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND call.call_state_code='운행전' AND users.user_no=deal.driver_no AND users.role='passenger' ) countTable

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT deal.driver_offer, deal.call_no, deal.driver_no FROM call, deal, users WHERE deal.call_no=call.call_no AND call.call_no=#{callNo} AND call.call_state_code='운행전' AND users.user_no=deal.driver_no AND users.role='driver' ) countTable
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shares(share_no, other_share_passenger_no, call_no, share_count, start_share_count, max_share_count, share_date, star) VALUES (seq_share_share_no.nextval, NULL, #{callNo}, #{firstShareCount}, #{startShareCount}, #{maxShareCount}, #{shareDate}, 0)

INSERT INTO shares(share_no, other_share_passenger_no, call_no, share_count, start_share_count, max_share_count, share_date, star) VALUES (seq_share_share_no.nextval, #{firstSharePassengerNo}, #{callNo}, #{firstShareCount}, #{startShareCount}, #{maxShareCount}, #{shareDate}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM( SELECT s.other_share_passenger_no, s.call_no, s.share_count, s.start_share_count, s.max_share_count, s.share_date, s.star FROM call c, shares s, users u WHERE s.call_no=c.call_no AND c.call_state_code='운행전' AND u.user_no=s.other_share_passenger_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
